book: 0237-Rejuva Minerals Tinted Moisturizer BB Cream, Fair-Light

chunk: Oil*, Glycerin, Jojoba Seed Oil*, Virgin Coconut Oil*, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-12, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate. *Certified Organic. May Contain: Zinc Oxide, Iron Oxides.

chunk:
Directions: Apply with fingertips to freshly cleansed and exfoliated skin. Apply a coat of Rejuva Minerals powder concealer or foundation for a boost of coverage. And/or apply a light layer of Rejuva Minerals Multi Task powder to set for longer wear (optional).

Warnings: none
book: 0237-Rejuva Minerals Tinted Moisturizer BB Cream, Fair-Light
